formattedAddress: 1088 Park Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1088 Park Ave, New York, NY 10128-1132, USA

originalText.text:
Never again! His office is conducted by a secretary who could be qualified for a prison guard not to assist patients!
The blood test results were not communicated even after 11 days since the blood was withdrawn. Consequently no treatment was prescribed even if the symptoms of the disease left the patient without sleep !
No way to get in contact with the doctor after repeatedly called the office and visited again in person the office.
It is incredible how Dr. H. Spiera has such a secretary.

originalText.text: Been a patient for over 15 years.  He's the best. Literally wrote the book.  Superb clinician, compassionate, practical and just all around a wonderful, kind human being. A doctor's doctor.  i have grown fond of all his office staff.  May take awhile. well worth the effort.
